title: The Priests of Plague
itunes:title: The Priests of Plague
description:
Robert is joined by Miles Gray to discuss the history of priests and plagues.

Footnotes:

  1. Popular televangelist: 'We don't have a flu season'
  2. Evangelical Trump adviser tells people to skip flu shots in favor of prayer
  3. Liturgical Processions in the Black Death
  4. THE BLACK DEATH AND ITS IMPACT ON THE CHURCH AND POPULAR RELIGION
  5. The Black Death of Cats
  6. Priests and the Black Death
  7. When a Third of the World Died
  8. Negative Shocks and Mass Persecutions
  9. How a South Korean church helped fuel the spread of the coronavirus
  10. Shadowy Church Is at Center of Coronavirus Outbreak in South Korea
  11. Without guidance from the top, Americans have been left to figure out their own coronavirus solutions
  12. One pastor was so outraged by church ban during Spanish flu that he went to jail
  13. Resolution, addressed to City Council, Los Angeles, written by First Chuch of Christ, Scientist
  14. In Italy and beyond, churches grapple with coronavirus
  15. 'Superspreader' in South Korea infects nearly 40 people with coronavirus
  16. The 1918 “Spanish Flu” in Spain
